title.narrative: Building Flood Risk Reduction Capacity In Lusaka City, Zambia

description.narrative: The project seeks to build climate change and disaster resilience in Zambia by implementing demonstration activities in Lusaka which resulted from a participatory planning approach within an improved institutional and legal framework. This requires enhanced inter-sectorial coordination for DRR, and reinforced local capacities within the Lusaka City Council.
